attributes.comment:
To Whom it May Concern,
In reference to U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services, docket number USCIS-2006-0044
I am writing today to ask that you reconsider your proposal to raise fees on the following items:
(*N-600, *I-600A Petition to Classify Orphan as an Immediate Relative,
*N-565 Application for Replacement of Certificate of Citizenship, and*Biometric Services)
I, along with many other friends have gone through the process of an international adoption.
Adoption is an amazing experience to build families and we all know it is a very expensive
undertaking.
Again I ask you to reconsider raising the above mentioned fees.
Thank you for your time and attention in this matter.
Sincerely,
Julie Crossnoe

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by J Crossnoe
